itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the open letter written by soldiers from Fort Bragg about the failure of their commanders to keep them safe, AOC being the political equivalent of Jussie Smollett, CNN’s ratings being in the toilet since Trump left office, Gavin Newsome’s impending recall election, and people who stormed the Capitol believing the election was stolen despite not actually voting in it.
